text: We collect the following types of information from our users.

We use this confirmation to improve our customer service.
We may use your contact information to send you information about our Services, but only rarely when we feel such information is important.
Your browser stores cookies in a manner associated with each website you visit.

As noted, however, we do use cookies to identify that your web browser has accessed aspects of the Services and may associate that information with your Account if you have one.
We automatically receive and record information from your web browser when you interact with the Services, including your IP address and cookie information.
We use cookies to enable our servers to recognize your web browser and tell us how and when you visit the Site and otherwise use the Services through the Internet.

We may need to share Personal Information with our Agents in order to provide products or services to you.

We share this type of statistical data so that our partners can understand how and how often people use our Services and their services or websites, which facilitates improving both their services and how our Services interface with them.

This Privacy Policy describes the policies and procedures of WillowSpace ("we", "our" or "us") on the collection, use, and disclosure of your information on www.willowspace.co and www.willowspace.app (the "Site") and the services, features, content or applications we offer (collectively with the Site, the "Services").
